mapper.select: select a.morSeq ,a.morDate ,a.morWarehousingNy ,a.morDelNy ,a.morRegDt ,a.morModDt ,a.mbrSeq from myorder a where 1=1

select a.motSeq ,b.morDate ,a.motCompCd ,c.pdtName ,a.motCount ,a.motAmt ,a.motWarehousingNy ,a.motDelNy ,a.motRegDt ,a.motModDt ,b.mbrSeq from myorderdetail a join myorder b on a.morSeq = b.morSeq join product c on a.pdtSeq = c.pdtSeq where 1=1 AND IFNULL(a.motDelNy, 0) = #{shDelNy} AND IFNULL(a.motWarehousingNy, 0) = #{shReceive}
AND a.morRegDt BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.morModDt BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd}

select a.motSeq ,b.morDate ,a.motCompCd ,c.pdtName ,a.motCount ,a.motAmt ,a.motWarehousingNy ,a.motDelNy ,a.motRegDt ,a.motModDt ,b.mbrSeq from myorderdetail a join myorder b on a.morSeq = b.morSeq join product c on a.pdtSeq = c.pdtSeq where a.motSeq = #{motSeq}
